text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Trump is using the daily COVID-19 coronavirus press briefings for his own personal and political gain. Instead of focusing on showing leadership in this time of crisis and providing key information on how the federal government is stepping in to take care of the American people. https://t.co/sSStE9aqzI
